mapper.select: SELECT rv.rvSeq ,rv.rvContents ,rv.rv_prSeq ,rv.rv_mmSeq ,rv.rvStar ,rv.rvCreDate ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM luv lv WHERE lv.lv_prSeq = prSeq AND lv.lv_rvSeq = rvSeq ) AS lvCount ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM luv lv WHERE lv.lv_rvSeq = rvSeq AND lv.lv_mmSeq = #{mmSeq} ) AS lv_ing ,mm.mmName ,mm.mmGrade ,pr.prName ,rvup.upPath ,rvup.upUuidName FROM review rv JOIN product pr ON pr.prSeq = rv.rv_prSeq JOIN member mm ON mm.mmSeq = rv.rv_mmSeq LEFT JOIN reviewUploaded rvup ON rvup.up_rvSeq = rv.rvSeq WHERE 1=1 AND rv_prSeq = #{prSeq} ORDER BY rvSeq DESC
SELECT avg(rvStar) AS rvStarAver FROM review WHERE rv_prseq = 4
